Use socks as makeshift shoes: Socks can be used as a substitute for shoes to protect your feet. They can be worn with or without shoes and will provide some protection.
Use blankets or rugs: You can use blankets or rugs to protect your feet when walking or standing on hard surfaces.
Use sandals or flip flops: If you have sandals or flip flops, you can use them to protect your feet when walking or standing on hard surfaces.
Use gloves: If you have gloves, you can use them to protect your hands and fingers, which will indirectly protect your feet.
